Tigrinya Dictionary
Blog tigrinya letters

There are 32 letter in tigrinya language and six vowels for each

Tigrinya letters with one leg

ONE LEG TIGRINYA LETTERS

e u i a ie - o
T ተ ቱ ቲ ታ ቴ ት ቶ
Ch ቸ ቹ ቺ ቻ ቼ ች ቾ
P ፐ ፑ ፒ ፓ ፔ ፕ ፖ
G ገ ጉ ጊ ጋ ጌ ጕ ጎ
N ነ ኑ ኒ ና ኒ ን ኖ
Y የ ዩ ዪ ያ ዬ ይ ዮ

Welcome to Tigrinya Dictionary

This Dictionary is the first of its type. User will be able to access this dictionary on Desktop, Labtop and windows phone. Compare with all other Tigrinya dictionary available on the marker, this app is much cheaper and have more than 50k words.

How to download the Dictionary

This dictionary is available on windows 10 devices. Downloading this App is quit easy process. The app can be downloaded from the windows store app on the devices.

Future Development

Our Team is working on making this app available on phone devices and improving the dictionary contents
